snippet.title: Hot Pot For One Trailer
snippet.description:
Hot Pot For One is a first-person game about being trapped at home, on a cold Christmas night, in a foreign country. You get through it by cooking a hot dish intended for six people. 

Twitter: https://twitter.com/HotPotFor1
